about.story: Founded in 2019 by seasoned guide Flavio Pana, OMA Natura is a tour agency based in La Fortuna, Costa Rica. With over a decade of guiding experience, Flavio and a team of local experts aim to offer unique and unforgettable tours. Specializing in birdwatching and night tours, OMA Natura takes you to both hidden gems and popular spots in the Costa Rican Rainforest, providing an unparalleled wildlife experience. Join us to explore the vibrant biodiversity and the serene beauty of Costa Rica like never before.
